charges.charge_disposition: that Leave of Court is granted for the filing of the Dismissal of the Indictment agnst. deft. Castaneda-Dominquez. (1)

that the deft. Julian Tapia-Casteneda is hereby committed to the custody of the US Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 4 months. Deft. is advised of right to appeal. Upon release from imprisonment, the deft. shall be on supervised release for a term of 2 yrs. As a special condition, the deft. shall reside for a period of 4 months to commence immediately following release from imprisonment, at a halfway house or similar residential facility proximal to the Kennett Square, PA area as designated by the BOP and shall observe the rules of that facility. The deft. shall pay a special assessment in the amount of $100.00 which shall be due immediately and a fine in the amt. of $500.00 which shall be due 30 days from the entry of this jgm. Schedule of Payments and Statement of Reasons attached. (1)
